story-moment.OBTAINING THE SPACE STONE: Proxima Midnight joined her fellow Children of Thanos and Thanos himself when they boarded the Asgardian refugee ship in order to obtain the Space Stone.
story-moment.HUNT FOR THE MIND STONE: In Scotland, alongside Corvus Glaive, Proxima Midnight attacked Vision and Scarlet Witch, in attempt to take the Mind Stone from Vision.
story-moment.CLASH WITH THE AVENGERS: Proxima Midnight and Cull Obsidian met with Captain America, Black Widow, and Black Panther before all-out war broke out between the forces led by each group.
story-moment.FIGHT TO THE DEATH: During the Wakandan battle, Proxima Midnight had a furious fight with Black Widow and Okoye that ended with Proxima’s death thanks to Scarlet Witch.

powers+abilities.SKILLED FIGHTER: A highly-skilled fighter, Proxima Midnight is capable of taking on beings of great power, along with multiple combatants at once.
powers+abilities.SPEAR: Proxima Midnight’s primary weapon is a spear she deftly uses to both attack and defend with, including hurtling it at her enemies. Proxima can summon the spear back to her when needed.
powers+abilities.SWORDSWOMAN: Proxima Midnight is trained to fight with multiple bladed weapons, using both a sword and a concealed knife in combat.
